description:
First round of the exhibition match is Basil versus Buu! With no energy signatures to hint at their power levels, the 9th Universe’s warriors could be much more powerful than they seem. But that won’t distract Buu from his playtime.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Basil, der Treter aus dem 9. Universum! – Besiege deinen Gegner, Boo!
Dai 9 Uchuu Keri no Basil vs Dai 7 Uchuu Majin Buu!!
Universe 9`s Basil the Kicker vs Universe 7`s Majin Buu!
第9宇宙蹴りのバジルVS第7宇宙魔人ブウ!!
